articles.description: A doctor struggles with the lack of data surrounding the Covid-19 vaccine and pregnancy.
articles.content:
So its up to me and my nurse midwife, both of us smart clinicians, but not vaccine experts. I asked her what she thought, and she told me, Honestly, I have no idea.
